app.description: Mandatory if channel is `MOB`, `MOBB`. Not required for others.

mobile.description: Mandatory if channel is `AGT`, `BSC` and `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

channel.description:
This is the initiating channel.
1. `AGT`: Offline agent.
2. `BNKBRNCH`: Bank branch.
3. `BSC`: Business correspondent
4. `MOB`: Mobile application
5. `INT`: Internet portal
6. `INTB`: Internet banking
7. `MOBB`: Mobile banking
8. `ATM`: ATM
9. `KIOSK`: KIOSK

os.description: Mandatory if channel is `MOB`, `MOBB`. Not required for others.

postalCode.description: Mandatory if channel is  `AGT`, `BSC` and `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

exactness.description:
The amount configuration of the biller.
- `ANY` = editable
- `EXACT` = non editable
- `EXACT_DOWN` = editable, max is bill amount. Users can pay equal to or less than bill amount
- `EXACT_UP` = editable, min is bill amount. Users can pay equal to or  more than bill amount.
- `ADHOC, BOTH` = editable. Biller might not return amount.

assignedTo.description: Information about to who is working on the complaint

enum: ASSIGNED TO COU/ ASSIGNED TO BOU/ ASSIGNED TO OU
status.description:
Status of complaint.
- `ASSIGNED` = A customer has raised a complaint at an agent outlet or on the BBPS website, and a Complaint ID has been assigned to It. By default, it is assigned to the Customer BBPOU. At this stage, the Customer BBPOU may assign the complaint to the Biller BBPOU depending on the details of the complaint
- `ESCALATED` = If the BBPOU does not respond to the complaint within the specified TAT, the complaint gets escalated
- `RE ASSIGNED` = When Customer BBPOU re assigned the complaint to the Biller BBPOU
- `ASSIGNED TO COU/ ASSIGNED TO BOU/ ASSIGNED TO OU` = When BBPCU assign the complaint to BBPOU. If the COU and BOU are same for a transaction, then the status of complaint will be changed to Assigned to OU.
- `RESOLVED` = Once the BBPOU resolves the customer related complaint, the BBPOU updates the system

issueType.description:
It can be one of these values
`1` - Transaction Successful, account not updated
`2` - Amount deducted, biller account credited but transaction ID not received Transaction
`3` - Amount deducted, biller account not credited & transaction ID not received Transaction
`4` - Amount deducted multiple times Transaction
`5` - Double payment updated Transaction
`6` - Erroneously paid in wrong account Transaction
